amendment.description: To prohibit unauthorized military operations in or against Iran.

vote.text: Amendment SA 883, under the order of 6/27/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 40. Record Vote Number: 189.

action.text: Amendment SA 883 proposed by Senator Udall. (consideration: CR S4619-4621) To prohibit unauthorized military operations in or against Iran.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 883, under the order of 6/27/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 40. Record Vote Number: 189.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 883, under the order of 6/27/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 40. Record Vote Number: 189.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 883 proposed by Senator Udall.
